summary: The module implements a Checkov rule that inspects AWS security group resources defined in Terraform to detect inbound rules that allow unrestricted (any source) traffic on TCP port 3389, the default port for Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). It inherits from a generic unrestricted ingress base class to apply the specific port check.
business_intent: Help organizations enforce security best practices by preventing public exposure of RDP services, thereby reducing the attack surface and compliance violations related to open remote access ports in cloud environments.
